ReadGMSAPassword.meaning: This privilege allows you to read the password for a Group Managed Service Account (GMSA). Group Managed Service Accounts are a special type of Active Directory object, where the password for that object is managed by and automatically changed by Domain Controllers on a set interval. An attacker with control of an authorized principal may abuse that privilege to impersonate the GMSA.

GMSAPasswordReader.description: Use GMSAPasswordReader.exe to retrieve the NT hash for the GMSA. You may have more than one NT hash come back, one for the old password and one for the current password. Either value may be valid.

gMSADumper.command: # gMSADumper.py can be used to obtain the NT hash
gMSADumper.description: gMSADumper.py can be used to obtain the NT hash
